titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the payment of His Majesties rents, and revenues into his receipt of his exchequer, at his citty of Oxford
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at His Majesties court at Oxford, the eight day of February, in the eighteenth yeare of his reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
